text: Lie Mohammed says no-one is hungry  in Nig. because the FG has disbursed  100 billion naira to them for food. Now I am convinced that he is one of those that is being used as a guniea pig for Bill Gates' new Covid19 vaccine. He has been injected & it has affected his mind badly.
